metadata.dc:title: Density measurements of different receptors for Area PF
metadata.dc:description:
This dataset contains the densities (in fmol/mg protein) of 16 receptors for classical neurotransmitters in Area PF using quantitative in vitro autoradiography. The receptor density measurements can be provided in three ways: (fp) as density fingerprints (average across samples; mean density and standard deviation for each of the 16 receptors), (pr) as laminar density profiles (exemplary data from one sample; average course of the density from the pial surface to the border between layer VI and the white matter for each receptor), and (ar) as color-coded autoradiographs (exemplary data from one sample; laminar density distribution patterns for each receptor labeling). This dataset contains the following receptor density measurements based on the labeling of these receptor binding sites:
AMPA (glutamate; labelled with [³H]AMPA): fp
kainate (glutamate; [³H]kainate): fp
NMDA (glutamate; [³H]MK-801): fp
mGluR2/3 (glutamate; [³H] LY 341 495): fp
GABA<sub>A</sub> (GABA; [³H]muscimol): fp
GABA<sub>B</sub> (GABA; [³H] CGP54626): fp
GABA<sub>A</sub> associated benzodiazepine binding sites (BZ; [³H]flumazenil): fp
muscarinic M₁ (acetylcholine; [³H]pirenzepine): fp
muscarinic M₂ (acetylcholine; [³H]oxotremorine-M): fp
muscarinic M₃ (acetylcholine; [³H]4-DAMP): fp
nicotinic α₄β₂ (acetylcholine; [³H]epibatidine): fp
α₁ (noradrenalin; [³H]prazosin): fp
α₂ (noradrenalin; [³H]UK-14,304): fp
5-HT₁<sub>A</sub> (serotonin; [³H]8-OH-DPAT): fp
5-HT₂ (serotonin; [³H]ketanserin): fp
D₁ (dopamine; [³H]SCH23390): fp
Which sample was used for which receptor density measurement is stated in metadata files accompanying the main data repository. For methodological details, see Zilles et al. (2002), and in Palomero-Gallagher and Zilles (2018).
Zilles, K. et al. (2002). Quantitative analysis of cyto- and receptorarchitecture of the human brain, pp. 573-602. In: Brain Mapping: The Methods, 2nd edition (A.W. Toga and J.C. Mazziotta, eds.). San Diego, Academic Press.
Palomero-Gallagher N, Zilles K. (2018) Cyto- and receptorarchitectonic mapping of the human brain. In: Handbook of Clinical Neurology 150: 355-387
